nodes.documentation: @dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender account.
@dev Throws if called by any contract other than latest designated caller
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
 @param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership
